mealDesc: Enjoy the healthy Veggie Biryani with Indian flavours and spices, that makes you want more...!
Enjoy the exotic Hyderabadi Chicken Dum Biryani with flavours and spices, that makes your taste buds flow
Enjoy the Continental Chicken Chettinad Biryani with flavours and spices of South..!
Enjoy the Cultural meal of Brahmin with rice, dal and other Varieties that fill your plate and stomach
Enjoy the tasty Chicken Burger to fill your interest of stomach and make you want more
None tastes better than a burger with a spicy egg recipe added ingredients of leaves and sauce
All time evergreen favourite chinese Chicken chowmein to make you long for more
Enjoy Chinese Chowmein taste with healthy veggies and sauces that make your taste buds wet
Enjoy the hot pan Pizza with crispy edges and swirling sauces that are a taste of time
The extra tasty and spicy, the best in town Chicken Pizza served hot with tomato sauce
